attributes.action: EACH TEENAGER SHOULD HAVE RIGHTS TO VOTE 13 AND OVER
attributes.background: Teenagers need a say in government elections. And it would help if adults had an extra pair of children to help back up their decision, or for them to vote which side they approve with.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "if adults had an extra paid of children to help back up their decision".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
